text: Vin skazav, "Yakshcho budʹ-yake prodovolʹstvo zabezpechuyetʹsya do vas, ya mozhu poinformuvaty vas pro tse pered tym, yak vy otrymuyete tse. Tse ye deyake z znannya podarovanoho meni moyim Lordom. YA forsaken relihiya lyudey shcho ne viryatʹ v BOHU, ta shcho stosuyetʹsya U maybutnʹomu, vony diysno disbelievers
